name: Nicolo Ellinaki
story: Vasilis Costas was born and raised in Athens, Greece. He joined the Greek military at the age of 18 and quickly rose through the ranks. He is known for his tactical expertise, leadership skills, and ability to keep his team calm under pressure. He is married to his wife, Maria, and they have a young daughter together. Vasilis is proud to serve alongside his fellow soldiers in the fight for peace.
